ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped collard greens

cookingTips: Brown sausage separately and slice before adding to soup for better flavor distribution
Add pasta in the last few minutes so it doesn't absorb all the broth
Frozen collard greens are convenient and cook quickly in hot liquid
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user build a hearty, balanced soup by managing timing so pasta and greens stay tender without overcooking.
